Fales Library and Special Collections
Mordecai Riot Grrrl Collection
Mordecai
Mordecai
MSS.626
.25 linear feet in 1 half manuscript box and 1 oversize folder in shared housing
1995-2012 Mordecai was an active participant in the Riot Grrrl movement and a friend of Nomy Lamm. The Mordecai Riot Grrrl Collection (dated 1995-2012) consists of zines, ephemera, and posters documenting Queeruption and the Riot Grrrl movement in New York City in the late 1990s and early 2000s. The materials document not only the specific events, but also the broader queercore and Riot Grrrl cultural and social movements. The collection also includes multiple zines by Nomy Lamm concerning disability rights and body acceptance, as well as Swallow Your Pride published by those involved in planning Gay Shame movement activities in New York City. Materials are stored offsite and advance notice is required for use. Please request materials at least two business days prior to your research visit to coordinate access.
Scope and Contents
The Mordecai Riot Grrrl Collection (dated 1995-2012) consists of zines, ephemera, and posters documenting Queeruption and the Riot Grrrl movement in New York City in the late 1990s and early 2000s. The materials document not only the specific events, but also the broader queercore and Riot Grrrl cultural and social movements. The collection also includes multiple zines by Nomy Lamm concerning disability rights and body acceptance, as well as Swallow Your Pride published by those involved in planning Gay Shame movement activities in New York City.
Arrangement
This collection has not been arranged by an archivist. The materials are arranged in the order in which they were received from the donor.
Conditions Governing Access
Materials are open without restrictions.
Conditions Governing Use
This collection is protected by copyright and/or related rights. You are free to use materials in the collection in any way that is permitted by the copyright and related rights legislation that applies to your use. For other uses you need to obtain permission from the rights-holder(s).
Immediate Source of Acquisition
Donated by Mordecai in August 2022; the accession number associated with this gift is 2023.025.
Preferred Citation
Identification of item, date; Mordecai Riot Grrrl Collection; MSS 626; box number; folder number or item identifier; Fales Library and Special Collections, New York University.
Processing Information
At the time of accessioning materials were rehoused in archival boxes and folders, and described on the collection-level with a folder-level inventory.
Biographical Note
Mordecai was an active participant in the Riot Grrrl movement and a friend of Nomy Lamm.
